job_title: SERVICE MANAGER (Auxiliary Machinery/Cooling and Chiller systems)
job_responsibilities: ['Salary: 120,000 – 160,000 Baht/Month plus other allowancesJob Description:Leading and managing a team of Service Engineers based in Thailand and South East Asia.Effectively manages team members, including technicians, advisors and sub-contractors, to ensure team objectives and service goals are being carried outDisplays extensive working knowledge of industry standards and practices, including product details and company services offeredOffers exemplary customer service, including maintaining and developing customer relationships and ensuring repeat customers by upselling products and services and taking care of any customer concerns or complaints quickly and professionally Assists with or performs administrative tasksDevelops and improves the service sales through sales of standard and customized service contracts, monitoring of spare parts price level, focus and strategic service campaigns aiming to increase the customer perception and satisfaction Develops and responsible of working knowledge of industry regulations, restrictions, and laws, and ensures service department adheres to all regulations across the entire south east of Asia or wherever the service team may be required to act Sets up and maintains service desk, including managing service desk team members and constantly evaluating desk efficiencyResolves service desk problems and improves current service desk methods to increase productivity and customer serviceMonitors department issues and client complaints to define patterns and work to lessen those recurring issuesRegularly audits work being done and customer service being provided to ensure all standards are met and that repair work is carried out effectively, correctly, and thoroughlyOversees team members performing inspections, preparing reports, and doing repairs; if necessary, carries out these job duties personally to ensure highest quality of work and maximum customer satisfaction ']
job_qualifications: [':Thai nationality, MaleBachelor’s Degree in Mechatronics/Electrical/ Mechanical Engineering or related fieldAt least 5 years’ experience in service, maintenance (installation of machinery and troubleshooting)At least 3 years’ experience in manages team members, including technicians, advisors and sub-contractors.Able to travel in Asia Pacific and Europe.Good command in English both spoken and writtenLocation:BangkokWe invite qualified candidates to submit their resume stating their present and expected salary via"Apply Now"Please visit:https://www.facebook.com/FischerAndPartnersJobSearchAndExecutiveRecruitment/and click "LIKE" to receive updates on new job vacancies.Fischer & Partners Recruitment Thailand Office:Fischer & Partners Co., Ltd.55 Wave Place Building 21st Floor, Wireless Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330https://www.fischerandpartners.com ']

job_title: วิศวกรคลังสินค้า (นครสวรรค์)
job_description: คุณสมบัติอายุ 32-42 ปีการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาวิศวกรรมเครื่องกลหรือไฟฟ้ามีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 8 ปี ในสายงานที่เกี่ยวข้องมีทักษะในการออกแบบและตรวจสอบงานด้านวิศวกรรม/สถาปัตยกรรมให้ถูกต้องตามกฎหมายมีทักษะในการเลือกใช้วัสดุเพื่อใช้ในงานวิศวกรรมและสถาปัตยกรรมมีความสามารถในการใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ขั้นพื้นฐานสามารถทำงานประจำ/ต่างจังหวัดได้มีทักษะในการสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษและขับรถยนต์ได้ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษความรับผิดชอบหลักออกแบบ วางแผน วิเคราะห์ และหาแนวทางในการเลือกใช้วัตถุดิบต่าง ๆ ในเหมาะกับงาน สิ่งแวดล้อม และผู้คนที่จะมาใช้ชิ้นงานนั้นวงแผนบำรุงรักษาเชิงป้องกันแก่เครื่องจักรและอุปกรณ์ภายในศูนย์กำกับ ดูแล ปริมาณและประสิทธิภาพของเครื่องจักรและอุปกรณ์ให้เพียงพอต่อปริมาณงาน

Responsibilities of position:Compliance with company goals and objectivesProcessing of production orders according to costs, quality, and deadlinesRun maintenance activities of spare parts control, preventive maintenance, break down maintenance, continuous improvement, projects and documentationHighlighting improvements to the processes and assisting with implementationMaintain good working places in clean and tidySustaining the processes within the groupIf errors or deviations are noticed, the superior is to be informed immediatelyOther activities as superior assignmentMain duties:Monitor related issues of assembly/machining lines. Plan, test and coordinate the implementation of preventive actions in the production lines in order to establish and verify capable and stable production processes in terms of safety, quality, delivery and cost.Troubleshoot PLC controls with electrical components, servo-drives, motors, wiring and panels.Lead, coordinate and facilitate trouble shooting electrical issues, and issue resolutions as they relate to equipment downtime, throughput improvement or safety concerns. Establish, maintain, update and administer electrical control plans. Participate in all aspects of simultaneous engineering efforts to improve current processes and new projects. Provide technical support to production and maintenance organizations throughout the plant to evaluate and resolve maintenance problemsPerform any related tasks as neededRequirements:Degree of Engineering in Electrical, Electronics, Mechatronics with minimum 2-3 years working experiencesMaintenance experience (over 2 years with highly automated production systems is preferred)Knowledge with programmable logic controllers and robot controllersWork experience in the automotive supply industryComputer skills with SAP, Excel, Word, OutlookGood English communication skills in reading, writing and speakingThis job description enters into force on the day it is signed. It reflects the current status. The superior reserves the right to adapt the position to the changing circumstances.

As a Test Engineer, you'll need to thoroughly check materials, procedures and mechanical or electrical systems to ensure that customers get high-quality, functional products. They run tests on various components and features in order to identify and fix technical issues.Client DetailsOur client is an international semiconductor engineering company, provides semiconductor OEMs and associated technology and electronics manufacturers.DescriptionDesign test plans, procedures, scenarios, and scripts to accurately assess new products or software updates according to customer requirements and company policiesDevelop testing protocol for various aspects, such as usability, database impact, error and bug finding, regression testing, and implementation scenariosIdentify, analyse and create detailed records of problems that appear during testing, such as software defects, bugs, functionality issues, and output errors, and work directly with software developers to find solutions and develop retesting proceduresTrack problems, resolutions, and bug fixes throughout testing and create a comprehensive database of defects and successful mitigation techniquesCreate detailed, step-by-step documentation of test procedures for each phase or project as needed to ensure replicability, compliance with standards, and growth of company knowledge baseProfileBachelor's Degree in Mechanical / Electrical / Electronics Engineering or any related fieldsMust have at least 3 years' experience in ATE platform and Test Engineering for Semiconductors industryWell - versed in Test platform (LTX and MX) is a mustGood command of both spoken and written and EnglishJob OfferExcellent and competitive package, including fringe benefits & welfare, depending on experienceTo apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Kornkanok Tiyakhun on +66 2 012 5056

job_qualifications: ['s:Male/Female, age 22 - 35 years.Bachelor’s degree or higher in Mechanical Engineering or any related field.At least 2 years’ experience in the mechanical simulation such as Piping Stress & Vibration, Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), Acoustic, or Drop Impact is an advantage.Experience with Computer Aided Engineering (CAE) tools such as FEMAP, Ansys Workbench, Ansys Fluent, LS-DYNA, STAR CCM+, Hyper Mesh, etc.Basic understanding of Computer Aided Design (CAD) is sufficient such as NX, Solid Edge, Solid Works, etc.Experience in Air-Conditioners is an advantage.Good communication and presentation skill.Good command of English both written and spoken.Good computer proficiency.Role and Responsibilities:Responsible to analyse the piping design by using Finite Element Analysis (FEA) in order to confirm the product feasibility and strength performance. Create the FEA base models and perform modal analysis & dynamic response analysis on piping design to meet the structural target.Provide the optimal piping design to achieve the strength target.Perform CFD to determine air flow and temperature distribution.Validate the accuracy of simulation models by comparing with the actual testing result.Improve the FEA base models to accord with the several of products in order to reduce model build time & increase model accuracy.Working Day: Monday – Friday(08.00 – 17.45)Benefits & Welfare :BonusDiligent AllowanceFree MealsUniformShuttle ServicesOvertimeAttendance AwardAnnual Leave 6-17 DaysProvident FundMedical AllowanceGroup Life & Health InsuranceAnnual Health Check-upMonetary Assistance : Funeral & MarriageLoan schemeSaving ClubScholarship for Employees & ChildrenCompany trip, Family Trip, New year partySport clubs: Football, Running, Bike, etc.Contact :Daikin Industries (Thailand) LTD.Recruitment Sub Group: Human Resources ManagementTel. 0-3846-9700 Ext. 295www.daikinthai.com  ']
job_description: Qualifications:Male/Female, age 22 - 35 years.Bachelor’s degree or higher in Mechanical Engineering or any related field.At least 2 years’ experience in the mechanical simulation such as Piping Stress & Vibration, Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), Acoustic, or Drop Impact is an advantage.Experience with Computer Aided Engineering (CAE) tools such as FEMAP, Ansys Workbench, Ansys Fluent, LS-DYNA, STAR CCM+, Hyper Mesh, etc.Basic understanding of Computer Aided Design (CAD) is sufficient such as NX, Solid Edge, Solid Works, etc.Experience in Air-Conditioners is an advantage.Good communication and presentation skill.Good command of English both written and spoken.Good computer proficiency.Role and Responsibilities:Responsible to analyse the piping design by using Finite Element Analysis (FEA) in order to confirm the product feasibility and strength performance. Create the FEA base models and perform modal analysis & dynamic response analysis on piping design to meet the structural target.Provide the optimal piping design to achieve the strength target.Perform CFD to determine air flow and temperature distribution.Validate the accuracy of simulation models by comparing with the actual testing result.Improve the FEA base models to accord with the several of products in order to reduce model build time & increase model accuracy.Working Day: Monday – Friday(08.00 – 17.45)Benefits & Welfare :BonusDiligent AllowanceFree MealsUniformShuttle ServicesOvertimeAttendance AwardAnnual Leave 6-17 DaysProvident FundMedical AllowanceGroup Life & Health InsuranceAnnual Health Check-upMonetary Assistance : Funeral & MarriageLoan schemeSaving ClubScholarship for Employees & ChildrenCompany trip, Family Trip, New year partySport clubs: Football, Running, Bike, etc.Contact :Daikin Industries (Thailand) LTD.Recruitment Sub Group: Human Resources ManagementTel. 0-3846-9700 Ext. 295www.daikinthai.com

What's the role?This is an exciting role for a bright professional experienced in operations management to work closely with Regional Head of After Market Services and General Manager of Thailand to deliver value by streamlining tool services operations in Thailand. Hilti offers excellent opportunities to grow and encourage cross functional and cross country moves to support career progression of right candidates.Who is Hilti?If you’re new to the industry, you might not have heard of us. We provide leading-edge tools, technologies, software and services for the global construction sector. We have a proud heritage, built over 75 years, and a worldwide reputation for pioneering products and exceptional service.With 30,000 people in more than 120 countries, which we’re looking to expand, we’re a great place for you to show us your worth, step up to new challenges and grow your career.What does the role involve?Implementtool service strategybased on regional roadmap, as a change agent for the Tool Service Center & respective Market OrganizationsResponsible for day to day operations in repair centers , leading a team of operations manager and techniciansDeliver sustainableproductivityat defined end to endservice levelsAccountable to prepare and deliverRFbased on capacity/capabilities needsDrive & communicate a competitive tool servicedifferentiationand fair repair pricing to build a strong value for money awareness to support tool sales growthAccountable for sustainable implementation ofprocesses and repair standardsand respective modifications in repair center / tool service centerAccountable forlean cultureinTool Service Center and drive bottom up continuous improvement mindset to achieve operational excellenceAccountable for execution oflegal, compliance, ICS and HSE standardsin Tool Service centerResponsible for definition and execution ofcontingency & crisis plan Accountable for people andcompetencedevelopment Establish strongcollaborationwithin the Service Area leadership team to build a community of high performing teamImplement themanagement processto align with the Market Organization StakeholdersWhat do we offer?Show us what you’re made of and we’ll offer you opportunities to move around the business – to work abroad, experience different job functions and tackle different markets. It’s a great way to find the right match for your ambitions and achieve the exciting career you’re after.We have a very thorough people review process, unlike any we know of in any other business. We screen everyone in the company in a yearly career performance matching process. It means we can pair talent with opportunities - developing our people in their current roles or challenging them to work in new ways or in new places. It’s how we find the right fit and further our teams personally and professionally.Additionally, we offer you a competitive salary and a wide range of benefits, including training opportunities and very good health care plan.Why should you apply?We have an excellent mix of people, which we believe makes for a more vibrant, more innovative, more productive team. Success at Hilti is down to teamwork and ability, no matter what your background. If you have two or more years’ experience in engineering or construction, it’ll be a big advantage.What you need is:Degree of Engineering qualification Bilingual with fluency in Thai and English is a must Operations management experience of 6 years plus with organizations of repute in Automobiles / Services / ManufacturingGood Analytical skills Good stakeholder management skills If we’re impressed with your CV, we’ll invite you for an interview, introduce you to the team and pay for your travel to get there.Do you have any questions? Please contact recruitment team, Hilti (Thailand) Ltd.Tempted to apply or find out more? Go tohttps://careers.hilti.co.th/en-th

Responsibilities:Cost Management:Preparing preliminary and detailed cost estimates to establish project budget, cash flow projections and financial statements to monitor and control project cost and Conducting cost reconciliation to meet client’s cost requirementsValue Engineering:Reviewing project objectives and ensuring projects are delivered in the most cost effective wayTender Administration:Conducting feasibility studies and pre-qualification if Tenderers and preparing main contract and nominated sub-contracts tender documents and reportsContract Administration:Preparing contract documents, recommending payment for work done, administering contracts in accordance with contractual provisions, assessment of variation works and settlement of final accountOther Tasks:Pre-Contract work including preparation of estimates, feasibility studies, tender documents, tender reports etc. This includes taking off where requiredPost-Contract work including the processing of progress payments, variation orders, site meeting etc.Co-coordinating a project to ensure all relevant deadlines are achieved Promote a good and positive image of Company Reporting to the Project Director, Associate, and Senior Project Executive and/or any officer appointed by the BoardPerform any other ad-hoc tasks or duties Requirements:Degree in Quantity Surveying or Mechanical & Electrical Engineering Good verbal and written communication skills in English and Thai Candidates at entry level will be considered 2 - 5 years of relevant working experienceencompassing both pre and post contract in cost management consultancy environment.Experience in Contractor and / or Client side will also be taken into considerationCandidates at entry level will be considered Computer literacy Candidates with more than 6 years years and above ofrelevant working experiencein cost management consultancy environment will be considered for senior positions

job_description: หัวหน้างานโดยตรง :Factory Managerสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน :นิคมสินสาครวันเวลาทำงานปกติ :ช่วงทดลองงาน ทำงานวันจันทร์ - เสาร์ เวลา8.00-17.00 น.หลังผ่านทดลองงาน ทำงานวันจันทร์ - ศุกร์ และวันเสาร์ (เดือนละ1-2 เสาร์) เวลา8.00-17.00 น.ความรับผิดชอบ :ควบคุมดูแลบำรุงรักษาเครื่องจักรให้มีประสิทธิภาพเพื่อสามารถผลิตสินค้าได้คุณภาพตามมาตรฐานและได้ปริมาณตามเป้าหมายของตารางการผลิตตรวจสอบความพร้อมและความเรียบร้อยของเครื่องจักรให้พร้อมสำหรับการผลิตประจำวันกำหนดการควบคุมดูแลการจัดเก็บ และเบิกจ่าย Spare part ต่างๆของเครื่องจักรที่เกี่ยวข้องในการผลิตค้นหาสาเหตุ วิเคราะห์ และรายงานแนวทางการแก้ไขแก่ผู้บังคับบัญชาเมื่อเกิดปัญหาของในสายการผลิต และให้คำแนะนำเกี่ยวกับระบบการปฏิบัติงานและปัญหาที่เกี่ยวกับงานเฉพาะเรื่องแก่พนักงานตามความเหมาะสมรับผิดชอบระบบสาธารณูปโภคภายในโรงงานคุณสมบัติ:เพศชาย สัญชาติไทย อายุ 30-40 ปีวุฒิการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี สาขาเครื่องกล ไฟฟ้า หรืออื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้องประสบการณ์ในการซ่อมบำรุงรักษาเครื่องจักร และระบบสาธารณูปโภค อย่างน้อย 5 ปีขึ้นไป และมีประสบการณ์หัวหน้างานอย่างน้อย 1-2 ปีสามารถใช้ คอมพิวเตอร์ Microsoft Office ต่างๆและสามารถใช้ Auto CAD ได้สามารถอ่านแบบชิ้นส่วนเครื่องกลหรือแบบไฟฟ้ามีความรู้เรื่องงานซ่อมสร้างพอสมควรมีความรู้ด้านการบำรุงรักษาเครื่องจักรถ้ามีประสบการณ์ในงานธุรกิจสิ่งพิมพ์และบรรจุภัณฑ์ชนิดอ่อน Flexible Packagingจะพิจารณาเป็นกรณีพิเศษมีภาวะผู้นำสูง สามารถบริหารทีมได้ (ลูกน้อง 4 คน) มีทักษะในการให้คำปรึกษาFor interested candidate, please submit your updated CV with full details of working experience, stating present and expected salary together with recent photo by click"Apply Now"All applications would be treated with the strictest confidentiality.Chanwanich GroupSilom (Head office):Kongboonma Building, 699 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500Phrapradaeng :Suksawad Rd., Pakklong Bang pla kot, Phrasamutchedi, SamutprakarnSinsakhon :Sinsakhon Printing City & Industrial Estate, SamutsakhonFind us on Line application :“@chanwanich”

LEED, Thai Green Building-TREES-A is a plusStrong knowledge of local codes and standards.Strong analytical and problem-solving skillsExcellent English skillsAttractive salary and generous fringe benefits will be offered to the successful candidates.Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details and refer the position asAssistant Vice President Mechanical and Electrical – Real EstateTo sununtinee(at)mriww.co.thIf you believe that you are the right one,Call Sununtinee"NOW"+6689-922-1673

job_description: PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:Responsible for the Division Sales target annuallySPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES:Responsible for sales and marketing strategies, planning and sales campaign to build strong effective and productive of sales team target result and relationship with key accounts. job_title: Operator / พนักงานแผนกผลิต
job_description: รายละเอียดงาน:ดำเนินการผลิต ดูแลเครื่องจักร ที่เกี่ยวข้องในกระบวนการผลิต ให้ดำเนินการผลิตได้อย่างต่อเนื่องทำความสะอาด เตรียมเครื่องจักรให้พร้อม ทั้งก่อนและหลังการผลิตเข้าร่วมกิจกรรมTPM / Overhaul ตามที่ผู้บังคับบัญชามอบหมายคุณสมบัติ:เพศ ชาย อายุ 18 – 30 ปีผ่านการรับราชการทหาร/ศึกษาวิชาทหารการศึกษา ปวส. สาขาไฟฟ้า,เครื่องกล,ช่างยนต์,อิเล็คทรอนิกส์ หรือ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องประสบการณ์ 0 – 2 ปี ขึ้นไป ด้านการผลิต , ช่างเทคนิค ในโรงงานอุตสาหกรรมมีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับระบบคุณภาพต่างๆเบื้องต้น มีทักษะในเชิงช่าง สามารถดูแล เครื่องจักรได้สวัสดิการ:โบนัส (ตามผลประกอบการ)ปรับฐานเงินเดือนประจำปีกองทุนประกันสังคมกองทุนเงินทดแทนกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพเบี้ยขยันทุกไตรมาส (ไตรมาสละ 3,000 บาท)ระดับปฏิบัติการ - ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการค่าครองชีพ 500 บาทต่อเดือนประกันอุบัติเหตุ,ประกันผู้ป่วยใน/นอกตามอัตราตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีชุดยูนิฟอร์มฟรีอาหารมื้อกลางวัน/มื้อกลางคืนฟรีรถตู้รับส่งพนักงานสายอยุธยา,รังสิต,สุทธิสารการอบรมและพัฒนาศักยภาพในการทำงาน และสายอาชีพอย่างต่อเนื่อง ฯลฯสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน: นิคมอุตสาหกรรมโรจนะ โซน3ส่วนทรัพยากรมนุษย์บริษัท อิชิตัน กรุ๊ป จำกัด (มหาชน)111/1หมู่ 4 นิคมอุตสาหกรรมโรจนะโซน 3ตำบลอุทัย อำเภออุทัย จังหวัดพระนครศรีอยุธยา13210035-276-111 ต่อ 705 , 084-438-7693

job_description: หน้าที่งาน:ติดตั้งเครื่องมือทางการแพทย์บำรุงรักษาเชิงป้องกัน(Preventive Maintenance)ซ่อมบำรุง และเปลี่ยนอะไหล่ของผลิตภัณฑ์ตรวจสอบวิเคราะห์สภาพการชำรุดเสียหาย และแก้ปัญหาการใช้งานคุณสมบัติ:วุฒิการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี คณะวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ สาขาไฟฟ้า, อิเล็คทรอนิกส์,เครื่องมือและอุปกรณ์การแพทย์ หรืออื่น ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องเพศชาย/หญิง อายุ 27 - 35มีประสบการณ์ในสายงานอย่างน้อย 5 ปีมีความรู้พื้นฐานทางด้านไฟฟ้าอิเล็กทรอนิกส์หากมีประสบการณ์ด้านเครื่องมือแพทย์มาก่อนจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษสามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ดีหากมีTOEIC 500 คะแนน ขึ้นไปจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีบุคลิกภาพดี รักงานบริการและมีความอดทนสูงสามารถเดินทางต่างจังหวัดได้สวัสดิการ:ประกันสุขภาพ-อุบัติเหตุท่องเที่ยวประจำปีพร้อมครอบครัวตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพประกันสังคมโบนัสประจำปีฝึกอบรมในและต่างประเทศเรียนภาษาอังกฤษท่องเที่ยวประจำปีพร้อมครอบครัวค่าน้ำมันรถ/ เดินทาง (ขึ้นกับตำแหน่งลักษณะงาน)บริษัท พรีเมียร์ บิสสิเนส อินเตอร์ จำกัด (ฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคล)888/111-113,116,117 อาคารมหาทุนพลาซ่า ชั้น 11 ถนนเพลินจิต แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพฯ 10330โทรศัพท์ :02-6508681 ต่อ 801-802www.pbi.co.th

job_qualifications: ['s :-ป.ตรี- โท สาขา Computer Engineering, Mechatronics Engineering,Industrial Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, ElectricalEngineering, Robotics & AutomationEngineering หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่มีความรู้ ความชำนาญในสายงานมีประสบการณ์ด้านการขายและการตลาด อย่างน้อย5 ปี และมีความรู้ด้านการทำ Marketing Surveyมีความรู้ความเข้าใจเบื้องต้นในระบบAI, SI, Automation & Robotics มีความสามารถในการบริหารโครงการ(Project Management) มีความสามารถในการสื่อสารที่ดีเยี่ยม โดยเฉพาะการนำเสนองาน การจัดระเบียบเอกสาร และInterpersonal Skill สามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษ/ หรือภาษาจีนได้เป็นอย่างดี (จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ)ContactSomboon Advance Technology Public Company LimitedMs.Chatinee Phunpipat Tel.083-9123234112, Moo 2, 15th Km., Bangna Trad Rd., Bangplee, SamutprakarnTel : 02-728-8628, 02-728-8631Fax: 02-728-8515Website:www.satpcl.co.th ']

job_title: Lead of Process Engineer - Process Improvement
job_responsibilities: ['Responsibilities :Lead junior engineering team for daily/weekly/monthly KPI monitoring & tracking for further improvement.Lead team of KPI improvement (yield, cycle time, downtime, productivity, quality) for responsible products and perform continuous improvement activities.Lead to set up control and monitoring process to ensure the process capability are in control.To be lead line buy off/release after shutdown to ensure process/tooling/fixture have a good condition for production.Design of experiment, data collecting including analysis to make improvement and/or modification.Update the work instruction and maintain update the latest procedure base on engineering data and change notice.Assessing safety and environment issue is addressing thru the process step design.Work coordinate with development team for new product, process, tool, equipment that transfer to production line.Control full process flow final design of new product/process/tooling transfer from development phase to sustaining phase to ensure production be able to continue run as mass production with minimize excursion of productivity and quality. Identify key parameters for cost reduction or optimization to reduce scrap cost, overhead cost, or other cost related to responsible process.Co-ordinate with machine maker, and/or supplier for BU activities.Improve skill of operators to support production line & engineering operator to support improvement activities.Support management assignment.']
job_qualifications: ['s :Male or Female, Thai national and Age not over35 years.Bachelor Degree in Electronic or Mechanical Engineering.More than 5 years’ experience in process or production improvement and new process development.Experience in electronic field is preferring.Ability to work independently with minimum guidance and under pressure.Team work attitude and able to co-ordinate with team both internal & external organizationExperience with tooling jig & fixture design and quality system like ISO/TS16949:2002is a plus.Have working experiencewith westerner is a plus.Excellent analytical skills.Good working knowledge of both written and spoken English.We offer an attractive remuneration package to the right candidate in accordance with the requirements of the position. Only short listed candidates will be contacted.Candidates are requested to submit their application in English along with CV, transcript, recent photo, current and expected salary by click"Apply Now"ETA (Thailand) Co., Ltd.439 Moo 17 Bangplee Industrial Estate, Bangna-Trad Road., T.BangsaothongA.Bangsaothong, Samutprakarn 10570 | ThailandPhone: +66 20179400 Ext. 2217 | Fax: +66 2 0179401Website :www.eta.ch ']
job_description: Responsibilities :Lead junior engineering team for daily/weekly/monthly KPI monitoring & tracking for further improvement.Lead team of KPI improvement (yield, cycle time, downtime, productivity, quality) for responsible products and perform continuous improvement activities.Lead to set up control and monitoring process to ensure the process capability are in control.To be lead line buy off/release after shutdown to ensure process/tooling/fixture have a good condition for production.Design of experiment, data collecting including analysis to make improvement and/or modification.Update the work instruction and maintain update the latest procedure base on engineering data and change notice.Assessing safety and environment issue is addressing thru the process step design.Work coordinate with development team for new product, process, tool, equipment that transfer to production line.Control full process flow final design of new product/process/tooling transfer from development phase to sustaining phase to ensure production be able to continue run as mass production with minimize excursion of productivity and quality. Identify key parameters for cost reduction or optimization to reduce scrap cost, overhead cost, or other cost related to responsible process.Co-ordinate with machine maker, and/or supplier for BU activities.Improve skill of operators to support production line & engineering operator to support improvement activities.Support management assignment.Qualifications :Male or Female, Thai national and Age not over35 years.Bachelor Degree in Electronic or Mechanical Engineering.More than 5 years’ experience in process or production improvement and new process development.Experience in electronic field is preferring.Ability to work independently with minimum guidance and under pressure.Team work attitude and able to co-ordinate with team both internal & external organizationExperience with tooling jig & fixture design and quality system like ISO/TS16949:2002is a plus.Have working experiencewith westerner is a plus.Excellent analytical skills.Good working knowledge of both written and spoken English.We offer an attractive remuneration package to the right candidate in accordance with the requirements of the position. Only short listed candidates will be contacted.Candidates are requested to submit their application in English along with CV, transcript, recent photo, current and expected salary by click"Apply Now"ETA (Thailand) Co., Ltd.439 Moo 17 Bangplee Industrial Estate, Bangna-Trad Road., T.BangsaothongA.Bangsaothong, Samutprakarn 10570 | ThailandPhone: +66 20179400 Ext. 2217 | Fax: +66 2 0179401Website :www.eta.ch

job_responsibilities: ['Our client is a leading global manufacturer of Metal & fabrication parts.CHONBURIResponsibilities:The successful candidate and will be responsible for the following key tasks:Assures that customer goals, specifications and requirements for new projects are met.Establishes and implements departmental policies, goals, objectives, and procedures.Continuously strengthens all systems to strive for Excellence regarding all aspects of the business.Prepares and participates in the Quarterly Review with Group Company.Assures compliance with rules and regulations in the Operation activities.Supports Manufacturing regarding all aspects of Engineering (Tool and Die, Assembly, Quality Assurance, etc).Assures that all Goals for new customer projects are met and escalate deviations to the General Manager.Works closely with the Quality Department to assure flawless launches.Supports production with respect to Engineering.Supports trouble shooting and problem solving with engineering resources to assure uninterrupted manufacturing processes.Works cross-functionally with production and quality to assure flawless execution during series productionEstablishes and maintains the Bill of Material and supports group’s business systems with engineering resources to assure appropriate system functionality.Assures appropriate documentation of processes, equipment and systems.Establishes and maintains work instructions, quality manuals, procedures and systems to assure predictable processes.']

job_description: Our client is a leading global manufacturer of Metal & fabrication parts.CHONBURIResponsibilities:The successful candidate and will be responsible for the following key tasks:Assures that customer goals, specifications and requirements for new projects are met.Establishes and implements departmental policies, goals, objectives, and procedures.Continuously strengthens all systems to strive for Excellence regarding all aspects of the business.Prepares and participates in the Quarterly Review with Group Company.Assures compliance with rules and regulations in the Operation activities.Supports Manufacturing regarding all aspects of Engineering (Tool and Die, Assembly, Quality Assurance, etc).Assures that all Goals for new customer projects are met and escalate deviations to the General Manager.Works closely with the Quality Department to assure flawless launches.Supports production with respect to Engineering.Supports trouble shooting and problem solving with engineering resources to assure uninterrupted manufacturing processes.Works cross-functionally with production and quality to assure flawless execution during series productionEstablishes and maintains the Bill of Material and supports group’s business systems with engineering resources to assure appropriate system functionality.Assures appropriate documentation of processes, equipment and systems.Establishes and maintains work instructions, quality manuals, procedures and systems to assure predictable processes.Qualifications:Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering or any related field.At least 8 - 10 years experience in a supervisory related position, ideally coming from a medium-volume and low-cost manufacturing process, preferably with hands on knowledge and experience in sheet metal / fabrication production. Are you a creative Engineer expert on super-alloys and alloy welding? Target:UrgentGeneral Responsibilities:Responsible for DWDM WASON Technical Analysis monitoring and reacting to alarms/events generated within an infrastructure monitoring platform based on corresponding procedures.Specific Responsibilities:Troubleshoot and monitor activity throughout the network.Isolate and diagnose faults and escalate to higher levels of support for resolution as appropriate.Interact with departments to address issues identified within the network.Adhere to company and department policy and practice in an effort to assure prompt resolution to identified problems.Additional duties as assigned.Preferred Experience/Skills:·Bachelor’s Degree or Master’s Degree in Telecommunication/Electronics/Electrical engineering or related fields.·At least 5 years’ experience in implementing and maintaining transmission products (IP Transport and DWDM WASON)·Strong knowledge in Transmission technologies including IP Transport and DWDM WASON.·Basic knowledge in TCP/IP Networking, Network protocol such as TCP/IP, SNMP, VLAN, routing protocol, and MPLS.·Excellent English language written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills (Chinese communication will be advantage)·Computer literacy (MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Visio)·Able to work flexible hours, including evenings and weekends; experience in a 7x24x365 support environment a plus.·Excellent troubleshooting skills.·Good decision-making skills.·Ability to work under stress.·Ability to follow detailed procedures.·Ability to work within a team environment.

An exciting SMT Manager (x1 vacancy) job has just become available at Electronic manufacturer based in Rayong, Thailand. This is a role for SMT Manager who thrive on challenging opportunity. The salary range for this role is THB 100k - 120k per month + benefits + massive bonus.Key Responsibilities:General assists in the production line of surface mount technologies, which involve attaching electronic materials to printed circuit boardsDevelop and implement advanced processes and SMT methodologiesPerform defect and failure analyses for Surface Mount Technology (SMT)Lead improvements in process yield, quality, cycle time, inventory accuracy and deliveryInspect various machinery, tools, and materials involved in the process to make sure that they are working properly.Lead a team of SMT Machine Operators and Process TechniciansReport direct to Plant ManagerTo succeed in the SMT Manager (Surface Mount Technology) job, you will need to have experiences on electronic industry with the ability to work effectively and co-operatively with the team.Key Requirements:Bachelor's or Master degree in EngineeringAt least 10 years in experience in electronic manufacturingStrong knowledge in SMT processSolid background in electronic businessMust have been working in MNC company with good understanding in international operationsMust have strong people management, leadership and presentation skillsGood command in English language This electronic company needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise. The culture is demanding but if you are confident and have a can-do attitude the potential rewards are significant and there are great opportunities to progress in this dynamic company.If you are a driven and determined SMT Manager with proven track record of achievements in manufacturing environment, this is an excellent opportunity for you.Apply today for this exciting opportunity. job_description: Duties:Setup and manage the safety laboratory for Battery Operated Toy and E&E products.To Lead the E&E and Calibration team for developing new capability and improvement of the existing tests to align with the regulation/specification or customer requirement.To interface with SGS networks and external organization for updating technical information.To manage lab resources and equipment ensuring the effective deployment and adequate resources in line with the volume of work and potential growth of business. Monitoring use and maintenance of the equipment and housekeeping in laboratory. Review the SOP and sample to ensure that they comply to test standards and client’s request. job_title: Sales Engineer for China Market(Chinese Speaking)
job_description: Job Description:The full-time person responsible in this position is to lead sales team and to develop overall sales activities in APAC. The main responsibilities are to build and maintain relationship with key partners/customers in the areas by creating new business opportunities and promote products to the market. The job requires the person to manage projects and customer new acquired accounts, by working with business unit managers, engineering team and marketing team with multiple functions internationally.Responsibilities:Expand sales market of corporate’s RFID/NFC/IOT products for the China market.Work together with China media and Chinese speaking countries to sell and engage with end user and small enterprises and provide accurate RFID solutions which could be involved. Develop and manage customer relationships in both pre- and post sales phases.Provide, present, interpret design, application, and service information in a variety of situations, including complex requirements and negotiationsAnalyze the current market price for RFID products and setup the competitive pricing on SIC products with the profitable corporate’s product marginRequirements:Chinese speaking (fluent in business communication)Engineering backgroundExperience inRFID/NFC industry, semiconductor, hi-tech product sales or related industry, i.e. IT, Telecom, Smart card or Embedded System is preferred.Sense of business, leadership, decision-making, problem-solving skills withability to deliver on deadlines and timelinesAbility to work independentlyGood computer skills on MS Excel, MS Project, PowerPoint, MS WordExcellent business English skills and Excellence communication skills both written and verbal.Very good interpersonal skill, effective ability to persuade and influence.

job_title: Head of Project Engineering and Maintenance
job_description: As a result of expanding, this world's leading FMCG manufacturer based in Rayong is recruiting an outstanding Project Engineering and Maintenance Manager (x 1 vacancy) to responsible for all changes and improvements at the plant, related to new products development, production efficiency improvements and capacity increase starting from scope definition till final hand over to production team as well as maintenance management systemAbout the Head of Project Engineering and Maintenance role:Reporting to the Plant Director (Foreigner) and working closely with Regional Director (Foreigner) based in Singapore, you will play a vital role to maintain the understanding and knowledge of company's standards and best practices in project executions as well as plant's technology and maintenance. The salary range for this role is THB 200k - 250k per month with allowance + bonus + provident fund.Key Responsibilities:Ensure coordinated actions across plant functions as well contractors, suppliers and other partnersEnsure timely plant CAPEX/OPEX budget planning for department as well as project-related budgets and control the execution and manage investment portfolio of the factoryEnsure timely and transparent reporting of Capex projects execution according company standards and manage & control KPI related to engineering function/departmentTake a leading role in defining and execution of plant technical development strategy, ways of reconstruction, reasonable level of process automation, environment protection measures, lean production, industrial safety and energy effectiveness of production as a mid-term and long-term strategyHandle preparation and start-up of new production lines and/or products including cross-functional collaboration, problems solving, information exchange. Lead and execute all changes related the product, it's packaging, as well as technological processTo succeed in this role, you must have the ability to lead and unite effectively and possess a keen understanding of project engineering and maintenance management within FMCG industry.Key Requirements:Bachelor's degree or higher in engineering or other related fields with a minimum of five years' experience in FMCG manufacturing environmentKnowledge of main business processes, technology as well as essential stages of manufacturing and packaging of finished productExceptional project management skills with a track record of delivering high quality projects in a manufacturing environmentAbility to listen & integrate business needs with detailed technical inputsGood command of Thai and English is a mustThis leading FMCG manufacturer needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise. The culture is demanding but if you are confident and have a can-do attitude the potential rewards are significant and there are great opportunities to progress in this dynamic company.If you are a progressive Project Engineering and Maintenance Manager with solid experience in FMCG manufacturing, this is an excellent opportunity to work with an industrial leader that is consistently breaking new ground.Apply today for this exciting opportunity.Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) LimitedRecruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551

The position of the Operator Partnerships Manager is a part of the Operator Partnerships organization structure. Operator Partnerships Manager is responsible for developing existing relationships with MNOs and promoting retention, loyalty and MNO's success through products and solutions.The main purpose of this role is to contribute to department goals by:Monetization of products and solutions•Identifying and creating new opportunities (cross-sell) •Driving the implementation of telco products for realized opportunities •Driving realization of CPaaS Business SolutionsMNO relationship monetization •Identifying and creating upsell opportunities •Driving the implementation of telco products for realized upsell opportunitiesMNO Relationship development •Improvement of MNO relationship •Regular QBRs and meetings with MNO •Enabling high MNO satisfaction •360 customer viewThis is achieved by Operator Partnerships Manager cooperating with multiple departments in the organization. Other responsibilities of OP Manager are to track industry trends, collect and transfer information from the market to internal departments, monitor legal regulations and prepare adequate documentation for the specific services to MNOs when necessary.More about you:•You are professional with vast experience in the telecom industry (you have more than 5 years of experience in telecommunication or IT industry).•You have a strong network and developed a personal brand with the MNOs•You have a bachelor’s degree in Business, Management, Communications, IT, Telecommunications or other related degrees; or equivalent combination of education and experience.•Written and verbal fluency in English is mandatory. •You have exceptional communication and presentation skills, toward both technical and non-technical audience.•A problem solver is your second name. When presented with an issue you approach it systematically and thoroughly to get to the best possible solution for all parties involved.•You have a strong customer-centric approach (customer satisfaction is at all times your priority).•You have the excellent strategic orientated mindset (you take a broad, long-range approach to problem-solving and decision-making that involves objective analysis, thinking ahead, and planning).Please send resume toCChadavipoo @ fircroft.com (อีเมล์ติดกันหมด)Fircroft Thailand.22nd Floor, 2202 Pacific Place II Building, 142Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok,, Thailand 1011002 653 2947 Ext 136

Senior Process EngineerResponsibilities:Supportthe introduction of new passive optics products into manufacturing.Support production facilities and operation.Generate and maintain documentation related to processes, tests, tooling and safety.Ensures designs, documents, and procedures have been validated in manufacturing prior to production release.Manage process development and improvements, ensure the accomplishment of the production plan.Provide technical support for the qualification and validation of new equipment and processes.Identify and implement new technologies to continuously improve processes.Investigate and fix root cause of line excursions related to process, tooling and / or components.Train, certify, and monitor work of technicians and operators to ensure product quality.Provide technical inputs for incident investigation considering an integral perspective (manpower, method, machines, materials, and measurement), documenting problem, root cause analysis and corrective action. Requirements:A BS or MS degree in Optics/Physics, or Optical/Mechanical Engineering.7+ years experiences in a high tech manufacturing environment.Minimum 3 years experiences with optics, optical components or telecommunication area.Demonstrated hands on experience in resolving technical issues involving lasers and optical components, optical alignment, optical test equipment and test system set-up. Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.Willingness to travel when needed.Familiar with Telcordia reliability testing of passive optical components is a plus.Experience in passive components assembly (FSIs, in-line isolators, couplers, VOAs, etc.) is a plus.English Communication is a must.We offer attractive compensation, benefits packages and career opportunities to the successful candidates. Interested applicants,Interested candidate please send your CV with your recent photo and your salary expectation via click "Apply now":Human Resources DepartmentFabrinet Company LimitedHemaraj Eastern Seaboard Industrial Estate 2 (Hemaraj ESIE 2)475 / 2 Moo 7, T. Klong kaeo, A. Ban Bung, Chonburi 20197, Thailand.Tel. (662) 524-9600 ext. 6471-6479Website:www.fabrinet.com

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:      System design, estimate cost and manage communication systems such as Digital Radio System (DRS) or CCTV or Telephone System (TEL) or Public Address System (PA) or Backbone Transmission System (BTN) or Master Clock (MCS) or BroadBand Radio (BBRS) to serve requirement of each project.Understand and analyst requirement and scope of work.Leading and supporting design document.Provide technical guidance to suppliers and other teams.Analyze and interpret all suppliers’ submitted data.Review, comment about Communication Systems (Telephone, CCTV, PA, PIS, IT, Broadband Radio, TETRA Digital Radio, Access Control, BTN Network, Master Clock) supplier’s documentation (design, drawing, test procedures and report) before issuing to client. An exciting Lead Engineer (x1 vacancy) job has just become available at heavy machinery business based in Rayong, Thailand. This is a role for Lead Engineer who thrive on challenging opportunity. About the Lead Engineer Role:You will be leading the team and play a vital role to deliver sound and effective engineering. The salary range for this role is THB 100k - 120k per month + benefits + massive bonus.Key Responsibilities:Leading projects, work planning, directing and overseeing designers and engineers assigned to your projects, design reviews (both internal and with client), and checking deliverableDevelop study reports, proposals, scopes of work, schedules, material lists, design concepts, scope change documents, and corporate guidelineManage scope, schedule, and budgetManage the engineering and design process from inception to completionVisit customer sites for field workAssist in commissioning and start upReport to Expat General ManagerDevelop and implement specific plant policies/ procedures as required To succeed in the Lead Engineer job, you will need to have experiences on heavy machine industry with the ability to work effectively and co-operatively with the team.Key Requirements:Bachelor's degree or higher in Mechanical or Civil Engineering or related field in heavy machine, construction manufacturing10 years of heavy industrial experience in a design or project engineering role. Solid background in heavy machine businessProject management experienceStrong knowledge of mechanical engineering principles with an emphasis on mechanics, heavy lifting and transport businessMust have strong people management, leader skill and presentation skillGood command in English language This heavy machine company needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise. The culture is demanding but if you are confident and have a can-do attitude the potential rewards are significant and there are great opportunities to progress in this dynamic company.If you are a driven and determined Lead Engineer with proven track record of achievements in manufacturing environment, this is an excellent opportunity for you.Apply today for this exciting opportunity.Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) LimitedRecruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551

Purpose of the jobImplement Wireless communication system designs for projects, proposals, product support and strategic programs for future products with a focus on hardware design, system link budgets and regulatory compliance. Application of the communications system is relevant to Communications Based Train Control (CBTC) solutions for Bombardier’s Main Line and Mass Transit solutions.Key responsibilities and challengesRF Systems Design (Conceptual, detailed and final design with documentation)Interface with other Sub-Systems/Third Parties for design and implementationInstallation, Testing and Commissioning support remotely and on-siteSupport Product development and planning for next generation Wireless SystemsSupport strategic sourcing for RF Equipment Vendor evaluation Bachelors degree in relevant engineering major, or equivalent industry experience.Experience required with:Design, test and/or commissioning of wireless communication systems with involvement in the complete design lifecycleGood working or theoretical knowledge of Wireless network design concepts such as RF link budgets, free-space propagation relevant to mobile applications, and RF component selection (cables, connectors, directional couplers, circulators, filters, etc).Knowledge of general communications theory concepts such as modulation, noise, delay spread, latency, processing gain, divisional multiple access methods, and bit error rates.Demonstrated experience with test tools such as spectrum analyzers, cable analyzers and distance-to-fault/return loss measurements is desired but not requiredExperience with Antennas related to Antenna selection and placement based on application requirements.Experience in general electrical hardware design, such as creating assembly drawings and bill-of-materials (BOMs).Knowledge of electrical installation practices a plus with a focus on grounding principles and lightning/surge protection.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES    To design all electrical portion functionality. Ensuring design meet customer requirement (Term of Reference).To assist in site activities related to survey, testing and commissioning activities in the field of Traction Power Substations, ensuring compliance with regulations pertaining to Safety, Environmental and Health regulations. Planning, coordination and execution of customer and operator training, carrying out tests on protection devices, station controller and supervisory systems.Giving experience feedback for follow-up projects and lessons-learned proposals to reduce costs, to shorten time of commissioning and to optimize engineering and products.Interface clarification and technical integration of all electrical systems within the BSS, TSS substation.Technical management, planning and controlling of one’s own engineering work packages.Project cost estimating for budgetary.To prepare documents from presales stage until transfer project to Project Management (PM) Department i.e.Presentation or documents from conceptual design and solution before bidding.Bidding Proposal including diagram, drawings, bill of material and so on.Cost sheet of project such as equipment, installation and testing to complete for bidding Price.Ensuring successful delivery of design including its interfaces and integration with parts of the system.To assist in site activities related to survey, testing and commissioning when required.Provide technical guidance to suppliers and other teams.Analyze and interpret all supplier' s submitted data.Review comment about Power Supply System supplier’s documentation before submit to customer.Attend regular meetings with supplier and customer.To carry out duties with or without supervision and meet time frames, budges and to agreed standards of quality.QUALIFICATIONSBA of Electrical Engineering, ideally in Power Distribution, Electrical Control System or related field.Knowledge of medium to high voltage, communication, network and transmission technology; European & International engineering standards and processes.Knowledge of railway DC and AC traction power technologies, railway auxiliary power distribution and railway earthing and bonding principles.Understanding in system calculation, manufacturing and installation matters with design and planning of electrical substation.Experience in commissioning of power supply related & engineering; project realization within an international project environment preferably within the railway sector particularly in the field of railway electrification systems would be an added advantage.License for Professional Engineers and Engineering Practice.Strong analytical, problem solving, flexible with good interpersonal skills and communication skills.Able to read, interpret and understand engineering drawing, customer specification and requirement, and other specifications.Good team player and a fast learner.Good command of spoken and written English.Positive thinking and a good attitude.Proficiency in computer skills and Microsoft Suite (MS Word, Excel, MS Project ad PowerPoint).Excellent skill in Visio, Auto CAD, and SketchUp.

job_responsibilities: [' Responsibilities:Overseeing and monitoring the design of the Jig concept and Layout concept of the new model.Driving continuous improvement activities in quality, cycle times, process improvement, machine availability through lean techniques and valueengineering to enhance the capability of existing processes and remove waste.Coordinating with maker or customer for a problem-solving job and creating a design.Controlling and monitoring manpower and performance.Controlling the production of new products both in the tooling and process to meet the requirements.Monitoring delivery of tooling and layout to the production department timely and in time.Being able to calculate the lead time and manpower including design jig and equipment to support production line.']

At least 5 years experience in Automotive Manufacturing.Have knowledge in TPS, Process flow, Process layout, WI, PCR, FMET, ISO9000/TS16949.Strong working knowledge of 2D and 3D CAD. "]
job_description: Responsibilities:Overseeing and monitoring the design of the Jig concept and Layout concept of the new model.Driving continuous improvement activities in quality, cycle times, process improvement, machine availability through lean techniques and valueengineering to enhance the capability of existing processes and remove waste.Coordinating with maker or customer for a problem-solving job and creating a design.Controlling and monitoring manpower and performance.Controlling the production of new products both in the tooling and process to meet the requirements.Monitoring delivery of tooling and layout to the production department timely and in time.Being able to calculate the lead time and manpower including design jig and equipment to support production line.Qualifications: Male, Age 35-40 years old.Bachelor's Degree or higher in Engineering, Faculty of Mechanical, Production Industrial, Electrical only or related field.Communication and presentation skills with a positive mindset.Good in spoken and written English.ISO/IATF16949, ISO14001, Core Tools or any related field.Minimum 10 years of experience in the production field. At least 5 years experience in Automotive Manufacturing.Have knowledge in TPS, Process flow, Process layout, WI, PCR, FMET, ISO9000/TS16949.Strong working knowledge of 2D and 3D CAD.

job_responsibilities: ['Job Description: Researches, designs, and develops circuits and test systems solutions for leading edge analog, digital, and mixed-signal productsResponsibilities may include, but are not limited to:Designing circuits and high accuracy solutionsDeveloping algorithms and computer programs for automated test systemsDesigning experiments and analyzing data Applying concepts and principles of circuit theory and design necessary to deliver next-generation integrated circuits (ICs)Collaborating with technical experts from cross-functional engineering teamsContinuous learning in a team environment Minimum ']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor’s degree in Electronics Engineering or related fieldBasic programming and component-level circuit design and debugging skillsSound understanding of fundamental electronic devices/circuit theoryHands-on experience with lab equipment such as multimeters and oscilloscopesWilling to travel abroad for advanced training (as required)Advantageous but not required: Possesses good English communication skills, written and verbalThrives in a global, multi-functional team environmentSelf-motivated to plan, organize, and prioritize assigned activitiesExhibits good interpersonal skills Experience with Teradyne microFlex, LTX, and/or ETS88Fresh graduates are welcome to apply Benefit:Working Hour: Monday – Friday 8:30 – 17:30Meal Allowance Transportation Allowance Quarter Bonus 1-month Bonus fixed (End of year) Provident Fund Health Insurance Bus Transportation (if require) Employee Activities such as: New Year, Songkran etc. ']
job_description: Job Description: Researches, designs, and develops circuits and test systems solutions for leading edge analog, digital, and mixed-signal productsResponsibilities may include, but are not limited to:Designing circuits and high accuracy solutionsDeveloping algorithms and computer programs for automated test systemsDesigning experiments and analyzing data Applying concepts and principles of circuit theory and design necessary to deliver next-generation integrated circuits (ICs)Collaborating with technical experts from cross-functional engineering teamsContinuous learning in a team environment Minimum Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Electronics Engineering or related fieldBasic programming and component-level circuit design and debugging skillsSound understanding of fundamental electronic devices/circuit theoryHands-on experience with lab equipment such as multimeters and oscilloscopesWilling to travel abroad for advanced training (as required)Advantageous but not required: Possesses good English communication skills, written and verbalThrives in a global, multi-functional team environmentSelf-motivated to plan, organize, and prioritize assigned activitiesExhibits good interpersonal skills Experience with Teradyne microFlex, LTX, and/or ETS88Fresh graduates are welcome to apply Benefit:Working Hour: Monday – Friday 8:30 – 17:30Meal Allowance Transportation Allowance Quarter Bonus 1-month Bonus fixed (End of year) Provident Fund Health Insurance Bus Transportation (if require) Employee Activities such as: New Year, Songkran etc.

job_responsibilities: [' Responsibilities Controlling and maintaining the calibration system within the organization, including the preparation of concerned documents and procedures.Coordinating with the QC Supervisor to review the impact of non-conforming products which are caused by machines, equipment or instruments.Coordinating with the QC Supervisor to monitor, review and analyze data from processes and products in order to improve said processes and products.Coordinating with the QA Supervisor to manage internal and external audits within the organization.Coordinating with the QA Supervisor to manage and summarize the organization’s customer complaints and non-conformities, as well as to follow up on CAPA and/or any improvements.']
job_qualifications: ["sBachelor's Degree in Physics, Materials Science or a related Science or Engineering degree.3+ years in metrology and calibration, QC or QA.Able to use a computer (Excel, Word, Powerpoint), and have good knowledge ofISO 9001, ISO 13485 and ISO17025 (plus skills).Good English communication skills.BenefitsGroup insuranceProvident fund 5%BonusBusOvertimeDiligence allowanceCost of living "]
job_description: Responsibilities Controlling and maintaining the calibration system within the organization, including the preparation of concerned documents and procedures.Coordinating with the QC Supervisor to review the impact of non-conforming products which are caused by machines, equipment or instruments.Coordinating with the QC Supervisor to monitor, review and analyze data from processes and products in order to improve said processes and products.Coordinating with the QA Supervisor to manage internal and external audits within the organization.Coordinating with the QA Supervisor to manage and summarize the organization’s customer complaints and non-conformities, as well as to follow up on CAPA and/or any improvements.QualificationsBachelor's Degree in Physics, Materials Science or a related Science or Engineering degree.3+ years in metrology and calibration, QC or QA.Able to use a computer (Excel, Word, Powerpoint), and have good knowledge ofISO 9001, ISO 13485 and ISO17025 (plus skills).Good English communication skills.BenefitsGroup insuranceProvident fund 5%BonusBusOvertimeDiligence allowanceCost of living

รายละเอียดงานกำหนดนโยบายและขั้นตอนการประกันคุณภาพวางแผนดำเนินการและดูแลตรวจสอบคุณภาพของวัตถุดิบ เพื่อให้มั่นใจในคุณภาพก่อนการรับเข้าวางแผนดำเนินการและดูแลตรวจสอบคุณภาพชิ้นงานระหว่างกระบวนการผลิตให้เป็นไปตามแบบที่กำหนดก่อนที่จะทำการส่งมอบให้ลูกค้าวิเคราะห์ข้อร้องเรียนของลูกค้าร่วมกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องถึงสาเหตุการเกิดและสาเหตุการหลุดรอดของปัญหา รวมถึงการหาแนวทางแก้ไขและป้องกันปัญหาวิเคราะห์ผลการตรวจสอบและดำเนินการตามกระบวนการการแก้ไขที่เหมาะสมดูแลตรวจสอบกระบวนการผลิตตั้งแต่เริ่มต้นจนสิ้นสุดกระบวนการผลิตเพื่อเป็นแนวทางในการประกันคุณภาพผลิตภัณฑ์ทดสอบเครื่องมือที่พัฒนาขึ้นใหม่ด้านคุณลักษณะและบันทึกข้อผิดพลาดหรือประสิทธิภาพการทำงานของเครื่องมือนั้นรวบรวมข้อมูลเกี่ยวกับข้อร้องเรียนของลูกค้าและสรุปเป็นรายงานประจำเดือน,ประจำปีติดตามการแก้ไขปัญหาในแต่ละกระบวนการที่สืบเนื่องมาจากข้อร้องเรียนของลูกค้าการดำเนินงานเพื่อเป็นการประกันคุณภาพของวัตถุดิบ, กระบวนการผลิต ผลิตภัณฑ์สำเร็จคุณสมบัติผู้สมัครวุฒิ ป.ตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมอุตสาหการหรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องต้องมีประสบการณ์การทำงาน ด้านการประกันคุณภาพ QA/QC 3 ปี ขึ้นไปสามารถใช้งานหรือมีประสบการณ์ในการทำงานกับโปรแกรม ERPมีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับการอ่านแบบ Drawing ,สามารถใช้เครื่องมือวัดได้มีทัศนคติที่ดีมีความรับผิดชอบสามารถทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันได้สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้เป็นอย่างดี

JOB DESCRIPTIONS:Construction plan for the site, manage day-to-day running of the project and site operations.Provide work to responsible teams and contractors, attend site/co-ordination meeting with others.Control the construction to meet the plan and effective.Check the work and report the progress of the job to the supervisor according to the construction plan assigned.Check and follow the work of the foreman and the contractor to meet the standards of construction work in accordance with the correct procedures.Control the materials used in the project. Maintain adequate tools within the project. And check the availability before operating.Identifies problems or issues at site and prepares relevant actions through communications, reports and performs immediate actions or solutions when needed at site with less supervision.Provides timely reports, progress picture reports, event report: deficiencies, hindrance notification, delays, damage report or other related reports as requested with organized documentation controls through software records and regular progress updates. QUALIFICATIONS:Thai nationality, age 22-35 years old.Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering or others relevant.Good command of English (conversation level or higher).Having Driving license and own a car.Can work and stay at the site place in upcountry of Thailand for long period 6 month , 1 year or over.EXPERIENCE1-3 years of experience of workingKNOWLEDGE/SKILL:Ability to problem-solve.Ability to concentrate on tasks, make decisions and work calmly and effectively in a high-pressure, deadline-oriented environment.Willingness to be flexible with time and adjust to a changing work environment.Ability to build and maintain positive relationships, both internally and externally, while maintaining a client service orientation.Consistent attendance either onsite or remotely as needed by the businessBUDGET SALARY : THB 18,000 – 30,000 per month (negotiate)

job_responsibilities: ['Feed Ingredients Trading Business Group (a member of Charoen Pokphand Group) is an industry leader in trading agricultural goods, procuring and distributing high quality agricultural raw materials to processors throughout the world. Headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand and operating in over 15 countries, our company strives to bring sustainability and social responsibility to the international market place.Commodity Analyst – Fundamental at Feed Ingredients Trading Business Group is a core part of our analytics team, and deal with a range of commodities across the globe: corn, soybean, wheat, fishmeal, etc. Our analytics professionals recommend buy and sell signals by forecasting the fluctuation in prices through lens of supply and demand analysis as well as market psychology. We consider a wide range of data from all over the world and help provide insights to support our traders. We are domain experts with a strong ability to understand, assimilate, and articulate complex and ambiguous information.Responsibilities:Analyze the global supply and demand of soft commodities in order to forecast future price movementsGather extensive knowledge on past events, weather patterns, and economic changes that have impacted the price of agricultural goodsMonitor and be aware of the impact of certain factors that drive the pricesMake critical decisions regarding financial positions the company will take in order to hedge against market risks or profit from future price movements']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor Degree or higher in Economics, Business, Engineering or other related fieldsStrong analytical and numerical skillsStrong problem solving ability with attention to details in a fast-paced environmentEnergetic, innovative, and focusedStrong communication skills with an ability to communicate complex and ambiguous information to othersFresh graduates are welcome to applyInterestedcandidates, please send full details of your qualifications, working experience, current and expected salaryvia APPLY NOW button. Feed Ingredients Trading Business Group (FIT)313 C.P. Tower, 4th Floor, Silom Road,Silom, Bangrak,Bangkok 10500 ']
job_description: Feed Ingredients Trading Business Group (a member of Charoen Pokphand Group) is an industry leader in trading agricultural goods, procuring and distributing high quality agricultural raw materials to processors throughout the world. Headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand and operating in over 15 countries, our company strives to bring sustainability and social responsibility to the international market place.Commodity Analyst – Fundamental at Feed Ingredients Trading Business Group is a core part of our analytics team, and deal with a range of commodities across the globe: corn, soybean, wheat, fishmeal, etc. Our analytics professionals recommend buy and sell signals by forecasting the fluctuation in prices through lens of supply and demand analysis as well as market psychology. We consider a wide range of data from all over the world and help provide insights to support our traders. We are domain experts with a strong ability to understand, assimilate, and articulate complex and ambiguous information.Responsibilities:Analyze the global supply and demand of soft commodities in order to forecast future price movementsGather extensive knowledge on past events, weather patterns, and economic changes that have impacted the price of agricultural goodsMonitor and be aware of the impact of certain factors that drive the pricesMake critical decisions regarding financial positions the company will take in order to hedge against market risks or profit from future price movementsQualifications:Bachelor Degree or higher in Economics, Business, Engineering or other related fieldsStrong analytical and numerical skillsStrong problem solving ability with attention to details in a fast-paced environmentEnergetic, innovative, and focusedStrong communication skills with an ability to communicate complex and ambiguous information to othersFresh graduates are welcome to applyInterestedcandidates, please send full details of your qualifications, working experience, current and expected salaryvia APPLY NOW button. Feed Ingredients Trading Business Group (FIT)313 C.P. Tower, 4th Floor, Silom Road,Silom, Bangrak,Bangkok 10500

job_description: Responsibility:Create standard operating procedures and costs for multiple grain drying plants in China.Manage and actively monitor factory operations in China ranging from production process to storage management.Initiate, plan and execute projects which mainly focus on improving drying plant capacity and efficiency to support fast-growing demand of feed ingredients. Evaluate new facility and factory as part of expansion process.Conduct feasibility study on viability of building new factory and distribution center.General qualification:Minimum bachelor degree in engineering (Mechanical or Electrical field is a plus)1-3 years of work experience in project management / manufacturing operations (Experience in feed business is a plus)Fluent in Chinese both written and spoken (Good command in English with TOEIC score above 550 is a plus)Proficient in MS Excel, SketchUp and AutoCAD (Experience in database management is a plus)Ability to work mainly in ChinaExceptional analytical and problem-solving skillsDeadline-driven, organized and able to multitask

job_responsibilities: ['วางแผน, ควบคุม, ติดตามและประสานงานระหว่างฝ่ายเทคนิค ฝ่ายขายและลูกค้า เพื่อสนับสนุนข้อมูล แนะนำ และทดสอบผลิตภัณฑ์ ให้ตรงตามความต้องการและลักษณะการใช้งานของลูกค้า รวมไปถึงการสนับสนุนการคิดค้นวิธีการใหม่ๆ ในการประยุกต์ใช้งานผลิตภัณฑ์ เพื่อรองรับการขยายตลาดร่วมกับทีมการตลาดและการพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ใหม่ร่วมกับ R&D อย่างเหมาะสมResponsibility1.จัดสรรและพัฒนาบุคลากรด้านเทคนิคให้สอดคล้องกับนโยบายและสถานการณ์ของบริษัท2.จัดการ วางแผน และควบคุมงบประมาณให้สอดคล้องกับนโยบายและสถานการณ์ของบริษัท3.วางแผนและดำเนินการพัฒนาปรับปรุงกระบวนการและสถานประกอบการ ทั้งในด้านความปลอดภัย เทคโนโลยี สภาพแวดล้อมการทำงาน4.ประสานงานกับลูกค้าและแผนกที่เกี่ยวข้องเพื่อให้งานบรรลุล่วงไปตามเป้าหมาย รวมถึงบริษัทในเครือ5.วางแผนและแจกจ่ายงานให้กับผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาให้เหมาะสม เพื่อให้เกิดความถูกต้องและรวดเร็วและสร้างความพึงพอใจให้กับลูกค้า6.ติดตามและทบทวนการทำงานกับผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชารวมถึงแก้ไขปัญหาและให้คำแนะนำ เพื่อให้งานบรรลุไปตามแผนที่วางไว้7.ตรวจสอบและทบทวนความถูกต้องของรายงานทุกครั้งก่อนส่งมอบให้ผู้ร้องขอหรือลูกค้า8.รายงานปัญหาที่พบรวมถึงนำเสนอแนวทางการแก้ไขให้กับผู้บังคับบัญชาทราบทันทีเมื่อพบปัญหาที่อาจทำให้งานไม่บรรลุตามแผนที่วางไว้9.แนะนำและนำเสนอข้อปรับปรุงในการทำงานให้แก่ผู้บังคับบัญชาทั้งในด้านบุคลากร เครื่องมือทดสอบ ซอฟท์แวร์ หรืออื่นๆ10.ประเมินและวางแผนพัฒนาบุคลากรให้มีความรู้ความสามารถตามเกณฑ์ที่กำหนดไว้11.ควบคุมและดูแลผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชา ให้สามารถทำงานได้อย่างถูกต้องและปลอดภัย']
job_qualifications: ['จบการศึกษาระดับ ปริญญาตรี/ปริญญาโท วิทยาศาสต์หรือวิศวกรรม หรือที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับการบริหารโครงการ,Technical Service หรือ R&D 15 ปีขึ้นไปหากมีประสบการณ์ด้าน Sales จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษสามารถใช้โปรแกรม MS Office ได้ดีสามารถขับรถยนต์ได้ มีใบขับขี่Toeic 500 Up ']

job_qualifications: ["s:Male or Female.Age 27-35 years old.Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Control & Instrumentation Engineering, Automation, Field robotics or a related field.At least 3 years experiences in vision systems, optical system and camera.Knowledge of computer programming (C++, NI LabVIEW, Visual basic and related.)Responsibility:Responsible for the entire life cycle of camera within beverage cans.Camera module development, monitoring of manufacturing quality.Camera calibration, image quality assessment and camera tuning.Coordinate all aspects of camera development working with QA, Production and other team including evaluation of camera modules of beverage cans. "]
job_description: Qualifications:Male or Female.Age 27-35 years old.Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Control & Instrumentation Engineering, Automation, Field robotics or a related field.At least 3 years experiences in vision systems, optical system and camera.Knowledge of computer programming (C++, NI LabVIEW, Visual basic and related.)Responsibility:Responsible for the entire life cycle of camera within beverage cans.Camera module development, monitoring of manufacturing quality.Camera calibration, image quality assessment and camera tuning.Coordinate all aspects of camera development working with QA, Production and other team including evaluation of camera modules of beverage cans.

job_title: Technical Engineer - RTD and Powder (New graduated are welcome)
job_description: ResponsibilitiesEnsuring production / manufacturing and logistics from the outsourcing to warehouse can serve the market and demand by efficient quality and costing.Provide the purchasing requisitions into the detail of daily operation in order to meet required manufacturing / production levels.Coordinate demand planning with the supply chain / planning teams, to ensure supply of raw materials and packaging materials are on time delivery to TPM site.Responsible for developing and monitoring TPM programs, tracking data, and preparing related reportsEnsure timely production of product meets schedule and company quality standards.Perform good issue for raw materials and packaging material usage on SAPMonitor inventory at TPM site, reporting out on status and usage variance.Coordinate TPM yearly audit with regional audit team and facilitate corrective action plans following audit result of non-complyingMaintain effective third party relationships to support the development, and commercialization of new and existing products, validation requirements and compliance standards for manufacturingRequirementBachelor of Science degree or higher in a scientific or technical Food Science, Food Engineering or relatedDemonstrated manufacturing experience within a regulated environment, including experience in UHT manufacture, bulk liquids, powder & solid doseDemonstrated relationship management, financial management, planning & procurement skillsDemonstrated ability to evaluate risks and shape decisions to ensure product safety, quality and compliance, and in consideration of potential business impact.Experience collaborating with various functional roles within Supply Chain, R&D and Marketing/Sales to develop strategies and execute action plans to resolve critical issues.Demonstrated ability to analyze/interpret complex problems with data gathered from a variety of sources utilizing analytical tools that focus on problem prevention.Demonstrated ability to work effectively with external partners including suppliers, third party manufacturers and regulatory agencies

job_title: Inspection Engineer(สายวิศวกรรมเครื่องกล)
job_responsibilities: [' Responsibilities:• Review job instructions, relevant documents, inspection procedures, including type sample (if any) prior to inspection.• Advise the Industrial Coordinator/Operation Manager/Manager Industrial Services of any problems or discrepancies that occur during the inspection, prior to making any decision or prior completion of the inspection.• Obtain the acknowledgement from the client’s / or supplier’s representative of inspection findings before leaving the factory.• Other duties as assigned by the Operations Manager.• Comply with company rules, regulations, and codes.']
job_qualifications: ['s:• Mechanical Engineering Degree• Minimum experience 3 years• Knowledge welding inspection• Knowledge NDT methods• Knowledge about pressure vessel or tank• Knowledge quality control or inspection background• Knowledge basic English in writing and speaking ']
job_description: Responsibilities:• Review job instructions, relevant documents, inspection procedures, including type sample (if any) prior to inspection.• Advise the Industrial Coordinator/Operation Manager/Manager Industrial Services of any problems or discrepancies that occur during the inspection, prior to making any decision or prior completion of the inspection.• Obtain the acknowledgement from the client’s / or supplier’s representative of inspection findings before leaving the factory.• Other duties as assigned by the Operations Manager.• Comply with company rules, regulations, and codes.Qualifications:• Mechanical Engineering Degree• Minimum experience 3 years• Knowledge welding inspection• Knowledge NDT methods• Knowledge about pressure vessel or tank• Knowledge quality control or inspection background• Knowledge basic English in writing and speaking

Responsibilities include the introduction and implementation of all necessary bid procedures, governance, and processes. This is a highly networked role that requires an ability to work under pressureand to challenging deadlines.Core ResponsibilitiesTo manage the bid qualification (bid go / no go) process for new opportunitiesPreparing and reviewing the commercial aspects of the bid, ensuring all services are included in the final price to the customerPreparing preliminary design PV system, PVsyst and SLDContributing to the written proposal - both in terms of content and presentationManage bid budget and ensure timely delivery of compliant and commercially sound bidsArrange all post bid reviews with customers, post contract awardRequirements:Minimum 7-years’ experience in a similar role in APAC region (Mainly focus in Vietnam, Philippine, Malaysia)Solar PV sector engineering and commercial backgroundStrong experience of bid campaign management from opportunity identification through to project deliveryEnglish both verbal and written proficiency, other regional language would be an advantageProficient in using Office 365, CAD and PVsystInterested candidate, please send your resume in English (Word format only)along with your recent photo and expected salary to us by E-mail.JAC International Recruitment Ltd.10F, Emporium Tower, 622, Soi 24, Sukhumvit Road, Klongton, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110Tel: 02-261-8710 Fax: 02-664-9929Contact: Chanida (Cherry)MNC Manufacturing Team
